name: UNSTABLE Derpy Slimey Alien Robot (from outer space)
name_original: UNSTABLE Derpy Slimey Alien Robot (from outer space)
description:
Help your friend, the Unstable Derpy Slimey Alien Robot from outer space, to rescue their friends from this poorly illuminated underground laboratory!

  • Use WASD or the arrow keys to move and jump!
  • Avoid the circular saw blades coming towards you!
  • Grab your friends! Each of them is 1 point!
  • Watch out! Over time you'll get faster and faster!
  • WHAT?! Now you're so fast you can FLY?! You're uncontrollable!
  • AWESOME! Maybe now you'll be able to destroy those blades! I'm pretty sure they count towards your total score...

That's it! Survive and challenge your friends to reach a bigger high score than yours.

This is my entry for the 2020 edition of the GMTK Game Jam!

Have a wonderful day!

Credits:

  • Art, coding and game design by yours truly!
  • Music by Bert Cole: www.bitbybitsound.com
  • Sound effects:
    • Source: freesound.org
    • Jump and Collect: Owlish Media
    • Spawn: Grubzyy
    • Damage [modified]: Raclure
    • Slime Death (1) [modified]: DrMinky (under Attribution License)
    • Explosion [modified]: timgormly
    • Laser3: nsstudios (under Attribution License)
    • Transformation (Bouncing Power Up 1_3): Jaon_Janz
